overview:
Sampathkumar (Sampath) Pudhukottai is a Principal with NEA-IndoUS Ventures. Sampath is a passionate business problem solver with over a decade of rich experience in the technology industry, spanning software companies in India and in the Silicon Valley.

Prior to joining NEA-IndoUS Ventures in 2006, Sampath held senior product management roles with Certus Software Inc. and Oracle Corp., where he worked with large enterprises, in successfully bringing enterprise software products to market, for regulatory compliance.

At Yodlee Inc., a pioneer startup in internet account aggregation, Sampath had a successful start as a Product Manager forging successful deals with customers, OEM and Application partners. In 2000, Sampath, founded Yodlee’s offshore development center in Bangalore, helping recruit a solid development team in a span of less than 8 months.

Sampath has authored whitepapers, filed for patents in the areas of Internet Account aggregation and Regulatory Compliance. Sampath holds an MBA from IIM, Kolkata, and a Bachelor’s in EE from IIT, Chennai.
